title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.19 - Length of vehicle combinations restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.19 - Length of vehicle combinations restricted

State Regulations

The total length of a combination of vehicles, except
fire vehicles, inclusive of load and bumpers, shall not be more than 60 feet. There shall be no more than four trailer units in any combination of vehicles. No single vehicle nor a tractor semi-trailer unit shall exceed 50
feet. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
